description: This file defines a React functional component for the sign-in route/page. It handles user authentication by providing a form with email and password inputs, managing form state, and calling an API to authenticate the user. Upon successful sign-in, it redirects to the dashboard, and handles errors gracefully.

methods.name: SignInRoute
methods.description: React functional component rendering the sign-in form and managing user authentication flow.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission that performs sign-in API call and handles redirection or errors.
